S.A.O.C was constituted in 1996 and commenced cable production in early 1999. Located in Muscat, the capital of the Sultanate of Oman, OFO uses state of the art technology to draw Fiber and Manufacture world class Fiber Cable products. OFO is a public listed company traded in the Muscat Securities Market (MSM).  Oman Fiber Optic Co. S.A.O.C (Muscat, Oman)  Senior System / Network Engineer From : June -2015 to: Present Following are the Responsibilities / Job description:  AD Architecture Design, Implementation and daily troubleshoot and administration  ADFS, DFS, DHCP in clustered configura tions  Group Policy, DNS, File Server, CA, AD RMS  Exchange Server 2010, 2016, Online  Virtual Machines – VMware vSphere Management (Data Center)  Backup – Veeam Backup and Replication, Symantec Backup and others.  Storage Management – Dell EMC  CCTV - DVR maintenance camera related work  PABX check & manage  Antivirus – Kaspersky, Symantec and other vendors product  Installation, configuration & administration of Proxy Server, Router, Firewall s.  Design, implementing and Managing LAN & WAN  Provide enhancement request feedback to IT manager regarding technology environment and user needs.  Ability to work independently and in a team environment.  Ability to communicate well with internal users and external vendors/contacts.  Report to IT manager and assist him/her in IT core activi ties  Adhere to IT Policy NASMA TELECOMMUNICATIONS LLC is a technology based IT and Communications Solutions Provider and Systems Integrator. Nasma is principally involved in providing integrated IT and communication solutions to various industries including Energy, Oil and Gas, Utilities, Telecommunications, Government, Banking and Finance, Industrials and Health Care. Nasma offers its clients a comprehensive range of advanced technology IT and communication solutions to suit various application and requirements involving the following:  Nasma Telecommunications (Muscat, Oman)  Network Engineer From : Dec-2013 to: June 2015 Following are the Responsibilities / Job description:  Configure and install various network devices and services (e.g., routers, switches, firewalls, load balancers, VPN, QoS)  Perform network maintenance and system upgrades including service packs, patches, hot fixes and security configurations  Monitor performance and ensure system availability and reliability  Monitor system reso urce utilization, trending, and capacity planning  Provide Level -2/3 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues  Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructure  Select and implement security tools, policies, and procedures in conjunction with the company’s security team  Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution HAYA WATER is a semi government Oman Waste Water Company working in Muscat. o: Nov-2013 Following are the Responsibilities / Job Description  Configuration, Installation and Troubleshooting of Servers, Workstations and Printers.  Installation, Configuration of Server 2003, 2008 , 2012.  Installation, Configuration of Windows 7 , 8 and Windows 10 Workstations .  Managing/Supervising Helpdesk team and Handling user complaints on phone and through remote desktop .  Configuration and Installation of Wireless Access points for LAN/Internet connectivity .  Working on CISCO Call Manager.  Hardware Maintenance/Part replacement of Computers and Laptops .  Managin g and Creating User accounts in Active Directory .  Managing Print server and Network printers .  Managing Multifunction RICOH Printers (Print, Fax, Copy and Scanning) .  MS Exchange Account management .  Servers and Workstation Image Backup using Acronis 10 .  Lost Data recovery using recovery software .  Installation and configuration of SOPHOS antivirus server .  Configuration and Installation of CISCO and ERICSON IP and Digital Phone systems .  Configuration and troubleshooting of Tally System (Tanker Services).  Configuration and troubleshooting of Call center.  Co-ordination with different Maintenance contracting companies and suppliers .  Management and updating of IT Asset reports .  Managing web based applications like Maximo, HRMS, GIS, Tanker Access System, and Oracle.  Financial and Call Center Application etc.  Managing Training and conference room PCs, Laptops, Projectors, Sound system etc.  VMWare Workstation .  Network switch and cable management .  Ticket Managemen t in e -support Application . CRESCENT BAHUMAN is the largest vertically integrated denim manufacturing facility in Southeast Asia. Crescent Bahuman Ltd. originally setup as a joint venture between The Crescent Textile Mills, Pakistan and Greenwood Mills Inc., USA is now fully owned by the Crescent Group . Crescent Bahuman Ltd. has established a corporate philosophy for the betterment of the nearly 7000 employees and community while ensuring an environmentally friendly manufacturing process. The network consists of more than 1000 nodes with mix topologies with WAN connectivity to our Head Office and another sister concern CTM Faisalabad.  Crescent Bahuman Ltd (Hafizabad, Pakistan)  IT Support Officer From: Dec-2010, To: Nov-2012 Responsibilities:  Worki ng on Service De sk Plus (Manage Engine)  Surveillance system installation and configuration, (POE Camera’s, IP Base Camera’s, Moveable & Static Camera’s and troubleshooting of them.  Repairing Camera’s (Hardware wise).  Create and maintain network user accounts.  LAN administration activity.  Addition/Removal of new hardware/software on the network.  General office support.  Supporting the Foreigner Guests, (Troubleshooting, Solutions for them).  Installation, maintenance, troubleshooting of network and computer system.  Installation of Hardware ( computers, printers and other related peripherals). Projects : Migration of Exchange Server 2010 On -Premise to Exchange Server 2016 June 2017 – July 2017 Project description  Health Check Assessment for Directory Service.  Health Check Assessment for Messaging Services.  High Level Design Architecture for Directory Services.  High Level Design Architecture for Messaging Services.  Migration Planning for Messaging Services Transition.  Prepare Directory Services for Transition.  Install and Configure virtual Windows Server 2016 - Exchange Server 2016 –Active, Passive, DR-Passive.  Prepare Messaging Services for Transition.  Adjust Client Access endpoint with publically registered name, enable Outlook Anywhere and verify Outlook Clients are connecting to new CAS namespace.  Install and Configure three virtual Exchange 2016 servers with Client Access and Mailbox Roles.  Adjust Exchange 2016 CAS Internal and External URLs and Install UC SSL Certificate.  Install and Configure DAG on Exchange 2016 mailbox servers for onsite Exchange Datab ase Resiliency.  Create Mailbox Databases on Exchange 2016 and replicate them via DAG.  Configure Intra Org email between Exchange 2010 and Exchange 2016.  Configure Inter Org email between POP Downloader and new Exchange 2016.  Swing CAS namespace to new Exch ange 2016 Servers and configure DNS distribution via DNS round robin for CAS High Availability.  Securely publish Exchange 2016 Client Access Services to internet via existing firewall.  Verify Outlook Connectivity to legacy mailboxes via new Exchange 2016 S ervers.  Conduct ~20 pilot user migration from Exchange 2010 to Exchange 2016.  Production user migration from Exchange 2010 to Exchange 2016.  Migrate Exchange Organization Messaging Services from Exchange 2010 to Exchange 2016.  Uninstall Exchange 2010 Mailbox Servers and join them to workgroup.  Uninstall Exchange 2010 CAS \HUB Server and join them to workgroup.  Deployment of anti -virus agents on new servers.  Deployment of backup age Manage Engine Service Desk Plus (HelpDesk) Deployment May 2017 – May 2017 Project description  Analyze the current IT Operations & practice.  Review of Current State  IT Service Catalog Workshop - Review  Design Incidents / Service Catalog Templates  Creating Technician Groups / Roles  Agent Deployment Assets and Network Scan  Workflow /AD integration / Mail configuration  Configuration Reports and Dashboard Customization  Scenario based Training (Train the Trainer Model)  Sign-off on the Deliverable  Project Closure -
